text: - Hema is a Dutch retailer,

now existing since 1926
in the Netherlands.

We have about 750 shops, 19,000
employees working with us

and bringing all those
sustainable products
towards our customers.
We started with AWS back in 2018

as we implemented our very
first e-commerce system,

and we were using AWS then
there as a integration platform
for our e-commerce system,
separating all the customizing software
from our e-commerce system,

and integrating it into
our legacy backend.

That helped us a lot to
bring towards our developers

the right technology and the
right innovative toolings

they needed to really
build software very fast.
We are working with 35 teams
and around 250 software developers,
which work on the AWS platform,
building lots of applications all around.
Think about the cake editor

where you can on the
famous Hamilton pools,

make the your logo of your
family and print it out.
That's running on AWS and built there.

We are really busy with is
data democratization right now.

All those business teams
we are working with,
they really need good data to work with.
They need to analyze that data.

They need to really bring new
innovations themself, right?

And having using AWS to
bring the right data,
towards those people, that helps us a lot.
AWS is a innovative platform,

which is very well known by
lots of software developers,
and it's also one of the platforms

which really started very early
with this cloud innovation,
if not inventor of the cloud.
